abstract: Donald J. Trump’s rough week was followed by a rough weekend, as he suffered potentially consequential losses at party events related to precious convention delegates in two states, and on the Democratic side, there were debates about debates and conflicts over how many donations from the fossil-fuel industry.

headline.main: Trump’s Troubles and Democratic Sparring Precede Wisconsin Vote

snippet: Donald J. Trump’s rough week was followed by a rough weekend, as he suffered potentially consequential losses at party events related to precious convention delegates in two states, and on the Democratic side, there were debates about debates and conflicts over how many donations from the fossil-fuel industry.
